nio/GooglePlus.description: Polls Google Plus for public posts. Official documentation of [Google Plus API](https://developers.google.com/+/api/latest/activities/search).

include_query.title: Include Query Field
include_query.description: Whether to include queries in request to Google Plus.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Number of posts notified on each url request.

lookback.title: Lookback Period
lookback.description: On block start, look back this amount of time to grab old posts.

polling_interval.title: Polling Interval
polling_interval.description: How often API is polled. When using more than one query. Each query will be polled at a period equal to the `polling_interval` times the number of `queries`.

queries.title: Query Strings
queries.description: List of queries to search public posts for. Note that multi-word queries will search for posts that have all of the words but not as a single string.

retry_interval.title: Retry Interval
retry_interval.description: When a url request fails, how long to wait before attempting to try again.

retry_limit.title: Retry Limit
retry_limit.description: Number of times to retry on a poll.

default.description: Creates a new signal for each Google Plus Post. Every field on the Post will become a signal attribute. Official documentation on the repsonse fields from Goolge Plus [here](https://developers.google.com/+/api/latest/activities#resource). See below for a list of commonly include attributes, but note that not all will be included on every signal.
